nodes.body: mnan chog. Ex: Gnod sbyin bres phong can mnan chog (W3853), Byur sri dam sri mnan pa (W22576), Chung sri mnan pa (W17528), Rdo rje’i khros pa’i rgyal gsen dang dam srin mnan pa (W8942), Sri ngan gdon bgegs mnan pa’i cho ga (W3869).
nodes.title: About Rituals for subjugating [various kinds of spirits]
